documentation.text:
@title IPriceOracle
 @dev Enhanced oracle interface for production vAMM
@dev Returns the current price with 18 decimals
@dev Returns the current price with timestamp
@dev Checks if the oracle is active and healthy
@dev Returns the maximum acceptable price age in seconds

@title IVault
 @dev Interface for the margin vault contract
@dev Gets available margin for a user
@dev Checks if user can be liquidated

@title IvAMM
 @dev Interface for the virtual Automated Market Maker
@dev Closes a position partially or fully
@dev Gets position data for a user
@dev Calculates unrealized PnL for a position
@dev Gets the price impact for a trade

@title MockPriceOracle
 @dev Mock price oracle for testing and development
@dev Returns the current price with 18 decimals
@dev Returns the current price with timestamp
@dev Checks if the oracle is active and healthy
@dev Returns the maximum acceptable price age in seconds

@title MockUSDC
 @dev Mock USDC token for testing vAMM system

@title Vault
 @dev Modular margin vault for the vAMM system
@dev Gets available margin for a user
@dev Checks if user can be liquidated

@title vAMM
 @dev Production-ready virtual Automated Market Maker with funding rate mechanism

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (address) view external returns (struct IVault.MarginAccount memory)

documentation.text: @dev Closes a position partially or fully
@dev Updates funding rate and applies funding
@dev Applies funding to a user's position
@dev Gets current mark price from virtual reserves
@dev Gets position data for a user
@dev Calculates unrealized PnL for a position
@dev Gets the price impact for a trade

@title vAMMFactory
 @dev Factory contract for deploying vAMM instances
@dev Emergency function to recover stuck tokens
